Subject: Re: The taunting ends. The death begins

X-Mailer: Windows AOL sub 111
From: Rudra656@...

::Amperion::
    He sees the bomb coming but doesn't worry because it is so small.  He 
will deal with the scorches later.  He turns to face Savior and lets the 
blast boost him forward.  He changes his grip on his two swords and holds one 
sidewise to decapitate Savior.  The other he points straight at Savior's head 
to impale it.
